body.p:
Louisville July 22nd 1861
To his Exclency B. Magoffin Govener and Commander in Chief &c
Sir
Herewith please accept my Resignation as Captain Company (K) 2nd Battalion 2nd Reg K. S. G

Respectfully
Preston Rogers
I recommend the acceptance of the within resignation.

R. McKee
Maj 2 Bat. 2 Reg Inft.
Louisville, July, 22 1861.
